reasoning: Reporting incidence of new cases. Neuroblastic tumors (primarily neuroblastoma) occur mainly in children with incidence of ~10.5 per million children under 15, translating to ~0.21 per 100k total population. Data from international cancer registries including SEER.
source: Ries LAG et al. (2007). SEER Cancer Statistics Review, 1975-2005. National Cancer Institute
